title: bhUmiyil mAniDa (kaNNigaL)
sahitya:
bhUmiyil mAniDa (kaNNigaL).  rAgA:  sindhubhairavi.  Adi tALA.


1:  bhUmiyil mAniDa janmam aDaindum Or puNNiyam inri vilangugaL pOl
 kAmamum kOpamum uLLam niramba vIN kAmamum shellam aDindiDumO
 caraNam 2   uttama mAniDarAi perum puNNiya nal vinaiyAl ulagil pirandOm
 sattiya jnAna dayAnidhi Aghi buddharai pOTrudal nam kaDanE
 caraNam 3   uNmaiyum Aruyir anbum ahimsaiyum illaiyenil nara janmamidE
 maN mIdilOr shumaiyE podi tAngiya pAzh maramE verum pAmaramE
